verses.name: Genesis 49:26
verses.text: The blessings of thy father have prevailed above the blessings of my progenitors unto the utmost bound of the everlasting hills: they shall be on the head of Joseph, and on the crown of the head of him that was separate from his brethren.

verses.name: Genesis 49:27
verses.text: Benjamin shall ravin as a wolf: in the morning he shall devour the prey, and at night he shall divide the spoil.

verses.name: Genesis 49:28
verses.text: All these are the twelve tribes of Israel: and this is it that their father spake unto them, and blessed them; every one according to his blessing he blessed them.
